email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope you're doing well. We have a vessel available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel MV SEA HORIZON is workable with a laycan of 25-30 March. The freight rate is $42/MT on CIF terms. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the offer. The rate of $42/MT is higher than what we're seeing in the market. Can you revise it to $38/MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best,
John Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
John,

I can offer $40/MT as a revised rate. The MV SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. The laycan remains 25-30 March. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Laura,

$40/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage rate. Also, send over the recap for final review.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer - Recap
email_chain.body:
John,

Here are the confirmed details:
- Vessel: MV SEA HORIZON
- DWT: 180,000
- LOA: 290m
- Laycan: 25-30 March
- Freight Rate: $40/MT CIF
- Demurrage: $25,000/day

Please confirm if everything is in order.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Vessel Offer - Recap
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with fixing the vessel. Thanks for your assistance.

Best,
John
